meanings.sent1: I love playing fetch with my bowwows at the park.
meanings.sent2: The bowwows wagged their tails happily when their owner returned home.
meanings.sent3: The bowwows chased their tails in circles, looking quite silly.
meanings.sent4: The bowwows' loyalty and companionship make them true friends.
meanings.sent5: The fluffy bowwows were a joy to cuddle with on the couch.

meanings.sent1: The dog bowwows loudly when someone knocks on the door.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood is quiet, except for the occasional bowwows of dogs.
meanings.sent3: The dog bowwows at the mailman every morning, thinking he's a new friend.
meanings.sent4: The dog's bowwows echoed through the empty street, breaking the silence.
meanings.sent5: The dog's bowwows alerted everyone to the approaching danger.

meanings.sent1: My dog bowwows whenever he hears a strange noise.
meanings.sent2: The little puppy is learning to bowwows as part of its training.
meanings.sent3: I tried to teach my cat to bowwows, but she just meowed back at me.
meanings.sent4: The old dog still knows how to bowwows to protect his family.
meanings.sent5: The dog will bowwows if he senses danger nearby.

meanings.sent1: The bowwows in the distance woke me up in the middle of the night.
meanings.sent2: The bowwows of the neighbor's dog can be heard throughout the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The spooky house was filled with eerie bowwows that sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent4: The bowwows of the guard dog kept intruders away from the property.
meanings.sent5: The bowwows of the stray dog echoed through the empty streets.
